title: "Some chunk options"
format: html
execute: 
  echo: false

# Echo

```{r}
#| echo: true

2*3
```

```{r}
#| echo: false

2*4
```


# Eval

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true

1 + 1 
```


# Include

```{r}
#| include: false
a <- 2

3*a
```


```{r}

4*a

```



# Cache

```{r}


a <- 3

```


```{r}
#| cache: true

b <- 4


a*b

```
